pages.text: If you need quick healing, a bandage will help. And, they're cheap to make. Upon use, you'll be granted 12 seconds of Regeneration.$(br2)If you're under the effect of Bleeding, bandages will instantly clear it.$(br2)If you're on the verge of death, a $(l:fortitude/first_aid_kit)first aid kit$() might be more appropriate.
